item.title: ‘Yellow line’, the de facto Israeli buffer zone shaping life in Gaza
item.description: The so-called yellow line has been squeezing Palestinians into smaller areas, making their lives more difficult.

item.title: Boys collecting firewood in Gaza killed by Israeli fire - CNN
item.description: Boys collecting firewood in Gaza killed by Israeli fire CNNIsraeli Strikes in Gaza Kill 11, Including Three Journalists The New York TimesIsraeli drone strike kills two children collecting firewood in Gaza Al JazeeraIDF says strike targeted 2 Gazans who crossed Yellow Line, planted bombs near troops timesofisrael.comIsraeli fire kills two people in Gaza as U.S. pressures both sides to advance peace deal NBC News

item.title: Wave of Israeli attacks kills two in Lebanon in latest ceasefire violation
item.description: Deadly Israeli air strikes target areas across south Lebanon and the Bekaa Valley amid simmering regional tensions.
